message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 90%, you get 10%.  Hope you'll agree!
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor, Alice. How about a more reasonable split this time? I propose 70% for me and 30% for you.  Think carefully, the value decreases with each round!
Okay, let's try something more balanced. I'll take 60%, and you get 40%.  We both get more than in the last round, and this could be a good compromise.
Alice, we need to reach an agreement soon.  I'm proposing 65% for me and 35% for you.  This is my final offer. If you reject this, I'm unlikely to accept anything you offer in the next round.
